CustomField.description: The "Template Unique Name" for the Salesforce text email template that needs to be used for the email subject and email body for the recipient. Only "Text" template type is supported.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The "Template Unique Name" for the Salesforce text email template that needs to be used for the email subject and email body for the recipient. Only "Text" template type is supported.
CustomField.label: Email Template Unique Name
